content: Mark Suster thank you for this deep post. My #1 reason for joining Tact this Fall was the team was not just talking about great enterprise user experiences, it was *actually* building them, one heavy Lego block at a time. As a former UX/product guy turned product marketer, I was inspired at Chuck’s superpowers on product and Trevor’s boldness towards sales and the team’s amazing collaboration and diversity. Onward and forward!
